titles.title: To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the feasibility of establishing and maintaining an automated and searchable system that tracks prescription drug prices in the United States, and for other purposes.
Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018
Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018
Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
